org.sakaiproject.assignment.impl

Class DbAssignmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.assignment.impl.BaseAssignmentService
      • org.sakaiproject.assignment.impl.DbAssignmentService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssignmentService, EntityProducer, EntityTransferrer, EntityTransferrerRefMigrator

    public class DbAssignmentService
extends BaseAssignmentService

    DbAssignmentService is the database-storing service class for Assignments.

      Extra fields to store in the db with the XML.

      The name of the db table holding assignment objects.

      Configuration: to run the ddl on init or not.

      The name of the db table holding assignment content objects.

      Set if we are to run the to-context conversion.

      If true, we do our locks in the remote database, otherwise we do them here.
